vocabInfos.mediumDef:
People descended from Casluch(?) of the Egyptians, first mentioned at Gen.10.14; descended from Egypt (H4714); along with Ludim (H3866), Anamim (H6047), Lehabim (H3853), Naphtuhim (H5320), Pathrusim (H6625) and Caphtorim (H3732);
progenitors of: the Philistine (H6430);
§ Casluhim = "fortified"
a people or tribe descended from Mizraim (Egypt) progenitors of the Philistines and Caphtorim
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
迦斯路希人 这个名詞 種族名稱在原文的意思是 "有防衛的"
麥西(埃及)的後裔, 麥西是非利士人和迦斐託人的祖先
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
迦斯路希人 这个名词 种族名称在原文的意思是 "有防卫的"
麦西(埃及)的后裔, 麦西是非利士人和迦斐托人的祖先
